name: Flying South Africa's NEWEST airline: LIFT Premium review
description:
Hello from South Africa - let's get a lift with LIFT! South Africa's hybrid budget carrier which offers a premium experience up front. This could go one of two ways...did LIFT impress?

0:00 Introduction
0:46 Premium service explanation, and check in experience
1:37 Bidvest Lounge JNB
3:14 Boarding our Airbus A320
4:45 Taxi and takeoff
6:32 Our route
7:06 LIFT premium seats
7:53 Basic catering service
8:34 Approach, landing and conclusions as well as fare paid

Date of Travel: 3 JAN 2022
Airline: LIFT
Livery: LIFT yellow tail
Route: JNB-CPT
Aircraft: Airbus A320
Flight Number: GE 103
Miles: 789
Airborne time: 1h50m
